<Datatable xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="../Documentation/Schemas/PlanetRemappingDefinition.xsd">

    <!-- This XML was generated by the Game assets export tool! -->
    <!-- Main menu > Mods > Game assets export tool (attention! it may take a long time to load all the game's assets! The application isn't frozen!) -->
    <!-- Note that I have renamed the textures for more clarity... -->
    <PlanetRemappingDefinition Name="CustomPlanet01BattleMat">
        <!-- Colors can also be modified, for the atmosphere for example. But this mod doesn't care (still keeping it, commented). -->
        <!--<ColorReplacement Name="_CloudColor">
            <Color Red="255" Green="255" Blue="255" Alpha="255" />
        </ColorReplacement>
        <ColorReplacement Name="_Color">
            <Color Red="37" Green="195" Blue="181" Alpha="255" />
        </ColorReplacement>
        <ColorReplacement Name="_Color2">
            <Color Red="94" Green="234" Blue="255" Alpha="255" />
        </ColorReplacement>-->
        <!-- Add a MaterialTextureProperty for each texture set you want to change (albedo, smoothness, clouds, emission, population...) -->
        <MaterialTextureProperty Name="_Diffuse">
            <!-- And add one TextureReplacement for each LOD there is. -->
            <!-- Note that the export tool generates only the largest sizes, you have to make the smaller ones with any image editing software. -->
            <!-- Also note that the textures must be in the Resources subfolder in your mod foder. Look at the reskin example mod for more info. -->
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="Octmap_LongitudeLatitude_2048" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\Diffuse_2048.png" />
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="Octmap_LongitudeLatitude_1024" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\Diffuse_1024.png" />
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="Octmap_LongitudeLatitude_512" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\Diffuse_512.png" />
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="Octmap_LongitudeLatitude_256" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\Diffuse_256.png" />
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="Octmap_LongitudeLatitude_128" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\Diffuse_128.png" />
        </MaterialTextureProperty>
        <!-- This mod only replaces the DIFFUSE map, but all the others can be replaced as well. -->
        <MaterialTextureProperty Name="_Illum">
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="PL_Burning_Lava_01_Emissive_4096" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\PL_Unique_Sykagoja_01_Emissive_4096.png" />
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="PL_Burning_Lava_01_Emissive_2048" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\PL_Unique_Sykagoja_01_Emissive_4096.png" />

        </MaterialTextureProperty>
        <MaterialTextureProperty Name="_Pop">
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="PL_Population_HomeWorld_Venetians_01_Emissive_4096" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\PL_Unique_Sykagoja_01_Emissive_4096.png" />

        <MaterialTextureProperty Name="_PopGradient">
            <TextureReplacement TextureName="PL_HomeWorld_Venetians_PopGradient_1024" ReplacementTextureFilePath="Textures\PL_Unique_Sykagoja_01_PopGradient_1024.png" />
